nam_item_help_smashball	Shatter this orb with an attack, then unleash your\r\nFinal Smash with the special-move button.
nam_item_help_assist	Call on different characters to help you fight!\r\nSome assist trophies can be KO'd, though...
nam_item_help_pokeball	Summon a random Pokémon to team up with\r\nyou against your foes!
nam_item_help_masterball	Summon a Mythical or Legendary Pokémon! \r\nMuch more valuable than a regular Poké Ball.
nam_item_help_dragoon	Collect all three parts to assemble the\r\nDragoon, and then unleash a powerful attack!
nam_item_help_genesis	Construct this huge weapon by collecting its\r\nthree parts, then use its powerful beam attack!
nam_item_help_carrier	Attack or throw it to get at the items inside. \r\nThrow it at an enemy to deal damage!
nam_item_help_powderbox	Watch out—if you do too much damage to this, it'll go\r\nBOOM! It'll blow up instantly if ignited, too!
nam_item_help_sandbag	Hit Sandbag to make items fall out! \r\nThe more you hit it, the easier it will be to launch.
nam_item_help_tabemono	Eat some to heal a little damage! Different foods will heal\r\nfor different amounts.
nam_item_help_maximtomato	A tomato with a big M on it. When eaten, it will \r\nremove 50% damage from your counter.
nam_item_help_heart	This removes 100% damage from your\r\ncounter! Grab it before your foes get to it!
nam_item_help_fairybottle	This item will only heal a fighter who has taken more \r\nthan 100% damage. Don't throw it at a badly injured enemy!
nam_item_help_mushroom	Touching this will make you giant, increasing your \r\nattack power and making you tough to launch.
nam_item_help_mushd	Running into one of these mushrooms shrinks you, \r\nmaking you less powerful and easier to launch.
nam_item_help_warpstar	Sends you shooting up, then back down for a devastating attack.\r\nAim your landing with left or right and adjust the timing with up or down.
nam_item_help_superstar	If you touch one of these, you'll be invincible\r\nfor 10 seconds. Woot!
nam_item_help_metalblock	Turns you into metal. Light attacks won't make you\r\nflinch, and you'll be tough to launch—but you'll fall faster.
nam_item_help_usagihat	Put this on to boost your speed and jumps greatly.\r\n"What long ears it has! Will the power of the wild spring forth?"
nam_item_help_curry	A spiciness out of this world! You'll constantly\r\nbreathe fire from your mouth!
nam_item_help_slow	This item slows down everyone except the player who\r\ncollects it...except when it backfires, of course.
nam_item_help_thunder	Grab this to make the other fighters shrink—unless it\r\nbackfires and shrinks you!
nam_item_help_killer	Use this to turn into a Bullet Bill and charge in a\r\nstraight line—right through anyone in the way!
nam_item_help_beamsword	Attack with a beam sword. The stronger the attack,\r\nthe longer the blade gets!
nam_item_help_ripstick	Attacking with this makes an energy-sapping flower bloom\r\non your opponent's head!
nam_item_help_starrod	Side smash attacks and side tilt attacks will make this\r\nitem fire star-shaped projectiles.
nam_item_help_firebar	This weapon has a long reach, but it'll get shorter\r\nthe more hits you land with it.
nam_item_help_club	Swing this to perform an incredibly strong attack. \r\nSide smash attacks will create a whirlwind effect.
nam_item_help_hammer	Once you start, you just can't stop swinging this item,\r\neven if the hammer's head pops off. Oops!
nam_item_help_homerunbat	Use a side smash to send a foe flying for the fences.\r\nIt's tricky to land, but it has lots of attack power!
nam_item_help_goldenhammer	Attack quickly over and over and over. Press jump\r\nrepeatedly to float through the air, too!
nam_item_help_superscope	Fire rapidly by pressing the button quickly, or hold the\r\nbutton to charge up! The fully charged shot is powerful!
nam_item_help_raygun	Fires a fast-moving shot that can knock enemies backward\r\nand into the air. Land multiple blows to really break their spirit.
nam_item_help_fireflower	Hold this out and bathe your foes in flame. The fire\r\ndoesn't last forever, though, so don't waste it.
nam_item_help_magicpot	Blow enemies away with this item. It's great for ruining\r\nsomeone's recovery, but it's easily blocked by shields.
nam_item_help_steeldiver	Give the torpedo a second and it'll shoot off at high speed.\r\nQuick, subtle, destructive.
nam_item_help_bombhei	Despite its size, this bomb packs a serious punch.\r\nLeft alone, it tends to get bored and wanders off...
nam_item_help_sensorbomb	Once placed on the battlefield, this small bomb will\r\ngo off the moment anyone gets too close.
nam_item_help_chewing	This bomb goes off shortly after sticking to something.\r\nIf that something is you, brush the bomb onto someone else! Fast!
nam_item_help_smartbomb	A bomb that creates a massive explosion, hurting anyone\r\ncaught in the blast. Unless it's a dud. Then nothing happens.
nam_item_help_bombchu	This little zippy bomb crawls on floors, walls, and ceilings.\r\nIt'll go off if it hits someone or the fuse runs out.
nam_item_help_crossbomb	The blast from this bomb will go in four directions.\r\nIt can go vertically and horizontally, or diagonally.
nam_item_help_dolphinbomb	This spaceship-turned-bomb will soar skyward, returning\r\na short time later to blow up on its launch site.
nam_item_help_deku	This little nut explodes on impact, dazing fighters\r\non the ground and launching those who are airborne.
nam_item_help_freezer	An item that slowly slides on the ground. If thrown,\r\nanyone hit by it will be frozen in ice for a time.
nam_item_help_smokescreen	After being thrown, this item will roll around on the ground\r\nor stick to opponents. The smoke makes it hard to see the battle.
nam_item_help_pitfall	This creates a hidden pitfall, trapping anyone\r\nwho steps on it in the ground, unable to move.
nam_item_help_pasaran	A fireball that grows when attacked. It will move around\r\nthe stage, growing bigger from fire or electric attacks.
nam_item_help_doseisan	Throwing Mr. Saturn won't deal much damage,\r\nbut he'll annihilate any shield he hits.
nam_item_help_greenshell	Attack or throw the Green Shell to send it sliding\r\nacross the ground!
nam_item_help_banana	A classic comedy staple: if you step on one of these,\r\nyou'll fall on your rump. It never gets old!
nam_item_help_bumper	A bumper can be placed in the air or on the ground.\r\nAnyone who touches it will be bounced like a pinball.
nam_item_help_unira	It will reveal its dangerous spikes after being placed.\r\nIt sticks to walls, too!
nam_item_help_soccerball	Give it a good kick, and watch the ball burst into\r\nflames! You can't pick it up, though—that's a foul.
nam_item_help_powblock	Hit it or throw it to launch everyone on the ground into the air.\r\nIt only has three uses, so POW wisely!
nam_item_help_togezoshell	If you throw this, it'll seek out the player with the highest\r\nscore (that isn't you), then slam down and explode on them!
nam_item_help_boomerang	When thrown, this object eventually comes back\r\nto the thrower. Catch it to boost its power!
nam_item_help_beetle	Throw it toward an enemy and, if it hits, it'll grab on and drag\r\nthem upward. The higher their damage, the harder it is to break free!
nam_item_help_chicken	Cuccos will wander around the stage, minding their own business. \r\nIf you're heartless enough to attack one, you deserve what you get.
nam_item_help_honeycomb	A swarm of bees will emerge, mobbing a fighter and dealing\r\ndamage to them bit by bit.
nam_item_help_killereye	A stationary cannon that shoots out damaging beams.\r\nYou can change its direction by hitting it.
nam_item_help_drill	Fire this to send a drill bit shooting across the stage, pushing\r\nenemies out and away. You can then throw the base!
nam_item_help_bossgalaga	This zippy item will try and capture opponents with a\r\ntractor beam and then carry them into space.
nam_item_help_badge	If you wear this, it reflects all projectile attacks\r\nfrom your foes.
nam_item_help_backshield	Pick this up and your back will be protected from attacks.\r\nA high amount of damage will destroy it.
nam_item_help_screw	Pick this up, and you'll be able to do Screw Attacks when\r\nyou jump.
nam_item_help_superleaf	Hold up or hold the jump button while wearing\r\nthis to hover with the help of a very fuzzy tail!
nam_item_help_rocketbelt	While wearing this, hold up or hold the jump button to fly\r\nstraight up in the air. You'll refuel automatically on the ground.

nam_special_upper_help_02_miifighter	Rises into the air with an\r\nuppercut, and then unleashes\r\na powerful punch at the end.

nam_final_arts_help_mario	Mario unleashes a devastating torrent\r\nof fire in the direction he is facing.\r\nThe attack covers a wide range and\r\ntravels far, so it's best to fire this\r\nafter you jump.
nam_final_arts_help_donkey	Donkey Kong pummels opponents\r\nwith a flurry of punches before\r\nlaunching them with a finishing\r\nuppercut. If the first hit doesn't\r\nmake contact, the whole attack\r\nfails, so make sure to get that hit in.
nam_final_arts_help_link	Link shoots an Ancient Arrow\r\nthat flies straight ahead. If the\r\narrow hits an opponent or the\r\nterrain, it explodes. You can only\r\nhit one fighter, but the explosion\r\nalso launches nearby opponents.
nam_final_arts_help_samus	Samus unleashes a massive,\r\nlong-range beam. You can angle\r\nthe beam up or down while firing.\r\nFighters are drawn to the center,\r\nand the attack repeatedly hits\r\nany foes caught in its blast.
nam_final_arts_help_samusd	Dark Samus unleashes a massive,\r\nlong-range beam. You can angle\r\nthe beam up or down while firing.\r\nFighters are drawn to the center,\r\nand the attack repeatedly hits\r\nany foes caught in its blast.
nam_final_arts_help_yoshi	Yoshi knocks down opponents with\r\na tackle. Then, Yoshis of various\r\ncolors appear and send the opponent\r\nflying! The first tackle can affect up to\r\nthree opponents, but be sure not to\r\nKO yourself if you miss everyone.
nam_final_arts_help_kirby	Kirby swings a sword that's\r\nwaaaaay bigger than he is.\r\nMake sure the first swing\r\nconnects with an opponent,\r\nor nothing else happens!
nam_final_arts_help_fox	Fox uses a targeting reticle to\r\nlock on to any opponents right in\r\nfront of him. If he acquires a target,\r\nthe Star Fox team shows up and\r\nunleashes a formation attack.
nam_final_arts_help_pikachu	Pikachu turns into a ball of\r\nelectricity that darts all over the\r\nstage. If an opponent gets caught in\r\nthis attack, they'll be constantly hit.\r\nFinally, Pikachu unleashes a powerful\r\nspark with high launch power.
nam_final_arts_help_luigi	Luigi vacuums enemies with hurricane-\r\nforce suction. Enemies caught by\r\nthis attack are damaged and fired\r\ndiagonally upward, potentially soaring\r\nright off the screen! If you suck up an\r\nitem, it becomes a projectile.
nam_final_arts_help_ness	With the help of Paula and Poo, Ness\r\ncalls down a shower of meteors that\r\ndamage any foes they hit. The meteors\r\nfall faster as time passes. The meteors'\r\ntrajectory can be adjusted slightly with\r\nleft or right input.
nam_final_arts_help_captain	The Blue Falcon races directly in front\r\nof the Captain, striking opponents and\r\nlaunching them to a race track where\r\nhe can run them down.
nam_final_arts_help_purin	Jigglypuff puffs itself up until it takes\r\nover the majority of the stage, then it\r\nrapidly deflates, launching nearby\r\nopponents. It's super effective\r\non small stages.
nam_final_arts_help_peach	Giant peaches descend from above,\r\nand nearby fighters fall asleep. The\r\ncloser a fighter is to Peach, the longer\r\nthey stay snoozing, giving Peach\r\nplenty of time to launch foes or recover\r\nhealth by eating the giant peaches.
nam_final_arts_help_daisy	Giant daisies float down from above,\r\nand nearby fighters fall asleep. The\r\ncloser a fighter is to Daisy, the longer\r\nthey stay snoozing, giving Daisy\r\nplenty of time to launch foes or to\r\nrecover health by smelling the daisies.
nam_final_arts_help_koopa	Bowser transforms into the gigantic\r\nGiga Bowser. Aim carefully and\r\nunleash a ferocious punch. If an\r\nopponent has already taken a\r\nlot of damage when they're hit,\r\nthey are KO'd instantly.
nam_final_arts_help_ice_climber	A huge iceberg emerges in the center\r\nof the stage. Opponents are hit each\r\ntime they touch it. You can control\r\nthe iceberg with left and right inputs.\r\nYou also move as normal, so be\r\nwary of self-destructing.

nam_final_arts_help_duckhunt	A flock of ducks flies by, and any\r\nopponents hit by them are set up\r\nfor five gunmen to fire at. If the ducks\r\ndon't hit anyone, nothing at all\r\nhappens.

nam_final_arts_help_inkling	The Inkling sets up the Killer Wail,\r\nwhich fires a sonic blast. The beam\r\ndamages and launches anyone caught\r\nin its path. The angle can be adjusted\r\nup or down. You can also move away\r\nfrom the beam and attack on your own.
nam_final_arts_help_ridley	Ridley tackles foes, hurling them onto\r\nSamus's Gunship. He then fires a\r\ndevastating plasma blast at them.\r\nThis move can hit up to two opponents,\r\nand anyone hit who has 100% or\r\nmore damage is instantly KO'd.
nam_final_arts_help_krool	King K. Rool charges forward. He then\r\nfires the Blast-o-Matic from his fortress,\r\nstriking any fighters he hit with his first\r\nattack. This blast completely destroys\r\nDonkey Kong Island, dealing serious\r\ndamage and launching fighters.
nam_final_arts_help_simon	Simon traps nearby opponents in a\r\ncoffin and repeatedly attacks them with\r\ncrosses made of holy light. You can hit\r\nmultiple opponents at the same time,\r\nso try to activate the move when\r\nopponents are clustered together.
nam_final_arts_help_richter	Richter traps nearby opponents in a\r\ncoffin and repeatedly attacks them with\r\ncrosses made of holy light. You can hit\r\nmultiple opponents at the same time,\r\nso try to activate the move when\r\nopponents are clustered together.
nam_final_arts_help_shizue	Tom Nook and his gang show up to\r\nbuild a Town Hall. The move traps\r\nopponents, and then Town Hall\r\nexplodes, launching those caught in\r\nthe blast. If no one is caught in the\r\ninitial attack, nothing happens.
nam_final_arts_help_gaogaen	Incineroar grabs an opponent while\r\nengulfed in flames. It then repeatedly\r\nattacks the foe in the air before\r\nslamming them back into a ring. Only\r\none fighter can be grabbed, but the final\r\nblast deals damage to anyone nearby.
nam_final_arts_help_packun	Piranha Plant summons a giant Petey\r\nPiranha that moves left and right while\r\nswinging cages. Fighters hit by a cage\r\nwill be trapped. In the end, Petey Piranha\r\nthrows the cages downward, launching\r\nthe fighters trapped inside.
nam_final_arts_help_jack	Joker dashes forward to strike. You can\r\nreverse directions while moving. If it hits,\r\nthe Phantom Thieves will execute an\r\nAll-Out Attack on up to four opponents.\r\nKOs instantly if damage is high enough.
nam_final_arts_help_brave	The hero swings his sword forward. If it\r\nhits an opponent, the hero calls upon the\r\npower of past protagonists. This attack\r\ncan hit up to three fighters and will\r\nlaunch them all at the end of the move.
nam_final_arts_help_buddy	Banjo and Kazooie summon a statue\r\nfrom the ground. If it hits an opponent,\r\nthe Mighty Jinjonator will awaken and\r\nunleash high-speed strikes alongside\r\nother Jinjos to launch the opponent.
nam_final_arts_help_dolly	A powerful triple combo that starts\r\nwith Triple Geyser, continues with\r\nPower Dunk, and ends with Buster\r\nWolf. Triple Geyser can damage\r\nmultiple opponents, but only the first\r\nopponent it hits suffers the full combo.
nam_final_arts_help_master	Stretch out the sword, attacking in front of\r\nyou. If it hits an opponent, Sothis will lend\r\nyou her strength, allowing you to unleash a\r\npowerful attack with the Sword of the Creator.\r\nThis attack can hit up to three opponents.
nam_final_arts_help_tantan	One opponent will be caught up in an attack\r\nfrom the left ARM as it transforms into Dragon,\r\nand from numerous ARMS fighters who swoop\r\nin to deal damage and send the opponent flying.
nam_final_arts_help_pickel	Create a big piston that strikes out to\r\none side. The piston can hit multiple\r\nopponents, but only one will be launched\r\ninto a dark room that then explodes.
nam_final_arts_help_edge	Swing the sword forward in a wide range. If it hits\r\nan opponent, Safer Sephiroth will appear and deal\r\nmassive damage with a supernova explosion that\r\ncan also sometimes inflict status effects. The first\r\nswing can hit up to three opponents.
nam_final_arts_help_eflame_only	Rex can hit multiple opponents with a huge\r\npillar of fire, launching them away. This Final\r\nSmash deals less damage than Mythra's, but\r\nit has higher launch power and can more\r\neasily KO opponents.
nam_final_arts_help_elight_only	Rain down arrows from above at the opponent\r\nRex strikes. This Final Smash has less launch\r\npower than Pyra's, but it deals high continuous\r\ndamage in a wide area.
nam_final_arts_help_demon	Unleash a long-ranged beam from the forehead.\r\nIf the beam hits an opponent, more beams from\r\nthe wings and chest will be unleashed, covering\r\na wide range and damaging any foes they hit.
nam_final_arts_help_trail	Hit opponents with a beam and launch them toward\r\na Keyhole. Up to three opponents can be affected\r\nby the Keyhole, and if their damage is high enough,\r\nthey'll be instantly KO'd.

nam_peculiar_help_00_kirby	Inhale can be used in many different ways.\r\n\r\nAfter Inhaling an Opponent\r\n　・ Special-move button: copy opponent\r\n　・ Attack button: spit opponent out as a star\r\n\r\nKirby can use the copied opponent's neutral special.\r\nTaunt to get rid of a copied ability.\r\n\r\nEat Items\r\n　・ Health recovery type: same as when picked up\r\n　・ Explosive type: take 5% damage\r\nYou cannot eat some items, like the Smash Ball.
nam_peculiar_help_00_wario	After taking enough damage, the motorcycle will\r\nbreak apart. If it breaks or falls off the stage,\r\nyou'll have to wait a while before using it again.\r\n\r\nMotorcycle Controls\r\n  ・ Tilt {[0105|1300]} forward: increase speed\r\n  ・ Tilt {[0105|1300]} opposite direction: turn\r\n  ・ Tilt {[0105|1300]} upward: wheelie \r\n  ・ Special-move button & attack button: get off bike\r\n\r\nYou can hit opponents with the bike after you've\r\njumped off, since it doesn't stop right away. You\r\ncan also pick up the bike after it has fallen over.
nam_peculiar_help_00_pikmin	Each of the Pikmin have different qualities,\r\ndepending on their color.\r\n  ・ Red: Attack↑ Throw↓\r\n  ・ Yellow: Attack Hit Box↑\r\n  ・ Blue: Throw↑\r\n  ・ White: Grab↑ Attack↓\r\n  ・ Purple: Attack↑ Reach↓\r\n\r\nUse Pikmin for Special Moves\r\n　・ Neutral: replenish Pikmin\r\n　・ Side: throw Pikmin\r\n　・ Up: fly with Winged Pikmin\r\n　・ Down: call back Pikmin
nam_peculiar_help_00_lucario	As Aura's power increases, your attack power\r\nincreases as well. The more unfavorable the\r\nmatch is for you, the more power you gain. \r\n\r\nAura's Power Increases\r\n　・ When you have fewer KOs than opponents\r\n　・ The more you've been KO'd\r\n　・ As your damage increases\r\n　・ As your HP decreases in stamina mode\r\n\r\nAura Sphere will get bigger, and the speed and\r\npower of it will increase. You can also leap higher\r\nand quicker when using Extreme Speed.
nam_peculiar_help_00_murabito	Depending on the tree's current state, the down\r\nspecial will change!\r\n\r\nPlanting\r\nThis will plant a seed in the ground.\r\n\r\nWatering\r\nThe sprout will grow into a tree.\r\n\r\nChopping\r\nChop the tree twice to make it fall away from you.\r\nIt will damage any opponents it hits.

The amount of damage or\r\n  number of times defeated doesn't impact Rosalina.\r\n\r\nIndependence\r\n  Even if Rosalina is incapacitated, such as being\r\n  grabbed or buried, Luma can still attack.

Charge it to the max to make\r\n  your neutral special become a KO Uppercut.\r\n\r\nKO Uppercut\r\n　Unleash a powerful uppercut that launches opponents.\r\n\r\n　You get various perks for using this on the ground.\r\n　・ Will not flinch when attacked by an opponent at\r\n　　 the beginning of the attack\r\n　・ Cannot be countered\r\n　・ Cannot be blocked by shielding
nam_peculiar_help_00_ryu	Some of Ryu's attacks can be executed by inputting\r\nthe command with the control stick and attack button.\r\nThis may raise the power of the attack, and some\r\ncan only be done this way.\r\n\r\nCommand Input (When Facing Right)\r\n　・ Hadoken: ↓→ + attack button\r\n　・ Shakunetsu Hadoken:  ←↓→ + attack button\r\n　・ Tatsumaki Senpukyaku: ↓← + attack button\r\n　・ Shoryuken: →↓ + attack button\r\nWhen facing left, the directional inputs will be reversed.\r\nShakunetsu Hadoken has a shorter range than Hadoken,\r\nbut it's a command-input-specific move that hits repeatedly.
nam_peculiar_help_01_ryu	The strength of the attack depends on how long\r\nyou hold the button.\r\n\r\n　Short hold: activates quickly and leaves you\r\n\t        less vulnerable\r\n　Long hold:  powerful and has a long reach\r\n\r\nHolding the attack button will change the type of\r\nattack, while holding the special-move button will\r\nchange its speed and power. Special moves\r\nhave three levels: light, medium, and heavy.
nam_peculiar_help_00_pacman	The Bonus Fruit changes depending on how long\r\nyou charge. It will change in the order listed below.\r\n\r\n　・ Cherry: shortest charge for an immediate attack\r\n　・ Strawberry: stronger than the cherry and flies farther\r\n　・ Orange: flies straight, so easy to aim\r\n　・ Apple: travels diagonally down when thrown\r\n　・ Melon: moves slowly, but deals a lot of damage\r\n　・ Boss Galaxian: hit foes multiple times if it hits early\r\n　・ Bell: stuns foes\r\n　・ Key: travels at high speed and launches foes\r\n\r\nBoss Galaxian, the Bell, and the Key can all penetrate foes.

nam_peculiar_help_00_shulk	Hold the button to make the Monado Arts wheel appear.\r\n\r\n　・ Jump: Jump↑ Defense↓\r\n　・ Speed: Speed↑ Attack/Jump↓\r\n　・ Shield: Defense/Weight↑ Attack/move speed↓\r\n　・ Buster: Attack↑ Defense/Launch Power↓\r\n　・ Smash: Launch Power↑ Attack/Launch Resistance↓\r\n\r\nYou can quickly and repeatedly press the special-\r\nmove button to cycle through arts as well.

Ken has more input moves than Ryu.\r\n\r\nCommand Input (When Facing Right)\r\n　・ Hadoken: ↓→ + attack button\r\n　・ Tatsumaki Senpukyaku: ↓← + attack button\r\n　・ Shoryuken: →↓+ attack button\r\n　・ Nata Otoshi Geri: →↓ + attack button\r\n　・ Oosoto Mawashi Geri: ←↓→ + attack button\r\n\r\nWhen facing left, the directional inputs will be reversed.
nam_peculiar_help_01_ken	The strength of some attacks depends on how\r\nlong you hold the button.\r\n\r\n　Short hold: quick but weak\r\n　Long hold: slow but strong with a long reach\r\n\r\nThe type of attack will change, and the move's speed\r\nand power will change. There are three levels:\r\nlight, medium, and heavy.\r\n\r\nWhen entering the command for Oosoto Mawashi\r\nGeri and Nata Otoshi Geri, hold the attack button\r\nto turn it into an Inazuma Kick.
nam_peculiar_help_00_cloud	Use down special to charge the Limit Gauge.\r\nWhen the gauge is fully charged, you can\r\nperform a Limit Break.\r\n\r\nLimit Break Effect\r\n　・ Unleashes a strengthened special move\r\n　・ Increases move speed\r\n\r\nThe Limit Gauge can also be charged by\r\ndealing or taking damage.
nam_peculiar_help_00_inkling	Ink Attack\r\n　When an opponent is inked, you'll\r\n　do more damage to them.\r\n　Ink wears off with time.\r\n\r\nRefilling Ink\r\n　Shield + hold the special-move button\r\n\r\nIf you run out of ink, you won't be able to\r\nuse some moves, and others will be less\r\neffective, so refill early and often.
nam_peculiar_help_00_jack	Joker's Rebellion Gauge will fill if he is hit while using\r\nhis down special and when he takes damage in general. \r\n\r\nWhen the gauge is full, Joker will summon Arsene, who\r\nstrengthens his attacks and changes his special moves.\r\n\r\nThe Rebellion Gauge also slowly fills over time.
nam_peculiar_help_00_brave	Special moves use MP.\r\n\r\nThe MP you need for each move varies.\r\nIf you don't have enough, you cannot use the move.\r\n\r\nYou can recover MP by attacking opponents or\r\nwaiting until your MP regenerates over time.
nam_peculiar_help_01_brave	Execute one of the commands displayed.\r\nThe MP required will vary depending on the command.\r\n\r\n■Command Selection (PART 1)\r\n\r\n・Bang/Kaboom: a bolt of light that explodes on impact\r\n・Sizz/Sizzle: a fire spell that unleashes a quick flash\r\n・Whack/Thwack: may instantly KO opponents\r\n・Kamikazee: blow yourself up to deal huge damage\r\n・Magic Burst: use all your MP for a large explosion\r\n・Snooze: puts foes to sleep\r\n・Heal: heal yourself (has limited uses)
nam_peculiar_help_02_brave	■Command Selection (PART 2)\r\n\r\n・Oomph: melee attack and launch ↑, defense slightly ↓\r\n・Acceleratle: speed and jump ↑, launch resistance slightly ↓\r\n・Bounce: reflect incoming projectiles for a time\r\n・Kaclang: makes you invincible, but you cannot move\r\n・Zoom: rise upward; you are invincible while rising\r\n・Hocus Pocus: triggers a random command or status effect\r\n・Flame Slash: swing a sword wreathed in flame\r\n・Kacrackle Slash: swing a sword engulfed in ice\r\n・Hatchet Man: heave your sword for a critical hit\r\n・Metal Slash: instantly KOs metal foes (including Kaclang)\r\n・Psyche Up: power up your next attack
nam_peculiar_help_00_dolly	■Strength of the Move\r\nThe strength of the attack can change depending\r\non how long you hold the button.\r\n・Quick press: weaker but less vulnerable\r\n・Hold down: power and range increase\r\n■Command Input\r\nPower up the move with directional inputs + attack button.\r\n・Burning Knuckle: ↓→ + attack button\r\n・Crack Shoot:  ↓← + attack button\r\n・Rising Tackle: hold ↓ a moment, then input ↑ + attack button\r\n・Power Dunk: →↓ + attack button\r\n\r\nThe input will be reversed when facing left.
nam_peculiar_help_01_dolly	You can use powerful specific command-input moves after\r\ntaking significant damage.\r\n\r\n■Criteria for Using Super Special Move\r\n・Stock and Time: accumulated damage is more than 100%\r\n・Stamina: stamina remaining is 1/3 or less\r\n■Command Input (When Facing Right)\r\n・Power Geyser: \r\n↓←→ + attack button or ↓←↓→ + attack button\r\n・Buster Wolf: \r\n↓→↓→ + attack button or ↓→↓→ + attack button\r\n\r\nThe input will be reversed when facing left.
nam_peculiar_help_00_tantan	■ARM Attack\r\n　・Attack button:\r\n\tPunch with the left ARM\r\n\tPowers up when throwing an opponent\r\n　・Special-move button:\r\n\tPunch with the right ARM\r\n\tThere are three ARMS available\r\n\r\nWhile on the ground, you can adjust the trajectory of the punch up or down.\r\n\r\nYou can unleash an ARM in the middle of attacking with the other.\r\nInput forward or backward to attack with your ARMS in those directions.
nam_peculiar_help_01_tantan	■Characteristics of the Right ARM\r\n・Ramram: It's fast and easy to bend, but less powerful.\r\nIt's perfect for distracting your opponents.\r\n\r\n・Megawatt: Has a short range and won't bend as easily.\r\nIt's very powerful and great for finishing off opponents.\r\n\r\n・Dragon: Has long range. Hold down the button to shoot\r\nlasers when using a smash attack.\r\n\r\nYou can switch between the three ARMS with your down\r\nspecial during battle.
nam_peculiar_help_00_pickel	The neutral special works differently depending on where you are.\r\n\r\n■On the Ground\r\n　Mine dirt, wood, stone, iron, and so on from the floor or walls.\r\n　You can sometimes obtain rare materials, like gold or diamond.\r\n　The harder the mining location is, the higher the chance to get rare materials.\r\n■In Front of the Crafting Table\r\n　Create the strongest tool with the materials on hand.\r\n　The rarer the materials, the stronger the tools.\r\n■In the Air\r\n　Use the materials you have to create blocks you can stand on.\r\n　Materials that are easier to get will be used up first.
nam_peculiar_help_00_edge	When in a pinch, a wing will emerge from your back and increase your power.\r\n\r\n■Conditions for Winged Form\r\n　・Winged Form will trigger easier the greater your disadvantage against your opponent.\r\nThis includes damage, score, or stock count compared to your opponent.              \r\n　・If you continuously deal damage to opponents or KO them, the effect will come\r\nto an end. Once it has ended, it cannot happen again until you get KO'd.\r\n　\r\n■Effects of Winged Form\r\n　・Power and movement speed increases\r\n　・Perform two midair jumps\r\n　・Gain super armor at the beginning of smash attacks
nam_peculiar_help_00_eflame_only	The side smash attack deals a lot of damage and has\r\nhigh launch power. It is specific to Pyra, and it can be\r\nused to KO opponents even at low damage.
nam_peculiar_help_00_elight_only	If an opponent lands an attack right before you dodge, you will take\r\nless damage and trigger a slow effect for a short time.\r\n\r\nTake advantage of moving faster than your opponent, and launch\r\na counterattack.
nam_peculiar_help_00_demon	■Rage\r\n　Attack power will go up when the below conditions are met.\r\n　・Stock or time battle: accumulated damage is 100% or more\r\n　・Stamina battle: stamina remaining is 1/4 or less\r\n\r\n■Rage Drive\r\n　Perform one of the actions below while on the ground to unleash\r\n　a powerful Rage Drive.\r\n　・→↓ + hold down attack button or special-move button \r\n　　(The input will be reversed when facing left)\r\n　・Down special\r\n　・Grab\r\n　If the Rage Drive hits an opponent, or if you repeatedly miss, your Rage will end.

nam_peculiar_help_03_demon	■Moves and command-input when facing right (3/3)\r\n・Crouch Dash: →↓\r\n・Wind God Fist: →↓ + attack button\r\n・Dragon Uppercut: →↓ + hold down attack button\r\n・Spinning Demon to Left Hook: →↓ + special-move button\r\n・Gates of Hell: ↓ + grab\r\n\r\nWhen using Wind God Fist (→↓ + attack button),\r\nif you enter the last  and press the attack button at the same time,\r\nit will become an Electric Wind God Fist.\r\n\r\nThe inputs will be reversed when facing left.
nam_peculiar_help_00_trail	The neutral special will change each time it is used,\r\nin the following order:\r\nFiraga → Thundaga → Blizzaga\r\n\r\n・Firaga\r\n　Shoot fire shots. Repeatedly press the button to continuously shoot.\r\n  Perfect for keeping opponents at bay.\r\n・Thundaga\r\n　Call down lightning that affects a wide area in front.\r\n  Useful against airborne opponents.\r\n・Blizzaga\r\n　Shoot scattering ice shots. Continuously hit to freeze for longer.

nam_technique_title_move	Moving
nam_technique_explain_move	Tilt {[0105|1300]} left and right to walk.\r\n\r\n　・ Tilt it slowly to walk\r\n　・ Tilt it quickly to dash\r\n　・ Keep {[0105|1300]} tilted to keep running
nam_technique_title_jump	Jumping
nam_technique_explain_jump	Jump using the jump button.\r\nYou can also tilt {[0105|1300]} upward!\r\nYou can jump in midair as well.
nam_technique_title_normal_attack	Attacking
nam_technique_explain_normal_attack	Use the attack button to attack.\r\n\r\n　・ Just the button: neutral attack\r\n　・ {[0105|1300]} + attack button: tilt attack\r\n　・ Flick {[0105|1300]} + attack button: smash attack\r\n\r\nSmash attacks are super effective!
nam_technique_title_special_attack	Special Moves
nam_technique_explain_special_attack	Use the special-move button and {[0105|1300]}\r\nto use four different moves.\r\n\r\n　・ Just the button: neutral special\r\n　・ {[0105|1300]} up + button: up special \r\n　・ {[0105|1300]} side + button: side special\r\n　・ {[0105|1300]} down + button: down special\r\n\r\nUp special is helpful for returning to the stage.
nam_technique_title_shield	Shielding
nam_technique_explain_shield	Press the shield button to defend yourself\r\nUse this to guard yourself against enemy\r\nattacks, then strike back!
nam_technique_title_emergency_avoidance	Dodging
nam_technique_explain_emergency_avoidance	Flick {[0105|1300]} while shielding to quickly\r\nevade an attack.\r\n\r\n　・ Flick downward: dodge in place\r\n　・ Flick forward: dodge forward\r\n　・ Flick backward: dodge backward\r\n\r\nUsing this move repeatedly can leave\r\nyou wide open to attack, so be careful.
nam_technique_title_catch_and_throw	Grabs and Throws
nam_technique_explain_catch_and_throw	Grab opponents by pressing the attack\r\nbutton while shielding.\r\n\r\nAfter Grabbing an Opponent\r\n　・ Attack button: attack grabbed opponent\r\n　・ Tilt {[0105|1300]}: throw opponent\r\n\r\nYou can also grab with the grab button.
nam_technique_title_stand_up	Getting Up
nam_technique_explain_stand_up	If you get knocked down, get back up quickly!\r\n\r\n　・ {[0105|1300]} up: get up at the current location\r\n　・ {[0105|1300]} side: get up while moving\r\n　・ Attack button: get up and attack
nam_technique_title_climb_cliff	Grabbing Edges
nam_technique_explain_climb_cliff	While Hanging from an Edge\r\n　・ {[0105|1300]} toward the edge: climb up right at the edge\r\n　・ Attack button: climb and attack\r\n　・ Shield button: climb and dodge\r\n　・ Jump button: climb and jump\r\n\r\nIf you tilt {[0105|1300]} away from the edge, you will\r\nlet go and fall.
nam_technique_title_item_throw	Throwing Items
nam_technique_explain_item_throw	Press the attack button while also using your\r\nshield to throw items. You can do this with the\r\ngrab button as well.\r\n\r\nWhen Throwing Items \r\n　・ Tilt {[0105|1300]}: throw in the direction indicated\r\n　・ Flick {[0105|1300]}: smash throw in the direction tapped\r\n\r\nThe speed and power of throwing an item will\r\nincrease when using smash throws!
nam_technique_title_become_conscious	Stun Recovery
nam_technique_explain_become_conscious	If you get stunned, move {[0105|1300]} around or\r\nrepeatedly press buttons to recover faster.
nam_technique_title_final_smashes	Final Smash
nam_technique_explain_final_smashes	If a Smash Ball appears, attack it and claim\r\nit for yourself! Once you get it, making sure\r\nnot to tilt {[0105|1300]}, press the special-move button\r\nto activate your Final Smash!\r\n\r\nUse it wisely! You generally only get\r\none chance to land your Final Smash.
nam_technique_title_meteor_smash	Meteor Smash
nam_technique_explain_meteor_smash	Launch opponents straight down for an\r\ninstant KO!\r\n\r\nMany moves can cause a meteor smash.\r\n\r\n　・ Mario: forward air \r\n　・ Donkey Kong: forward air\r\n　・ Samus: down air\r\n　・ Yoshi: forward air\r\n　・ Kirby: down air
nam_technique_title_shift_attack	Shifting Attacks
nam_technique_explain_shift_attack	The direction of some side tilt attacks and\r\nsome side smashes can be shifted with {[0105|1300]}.\r\n\r\n　・ {[0105|1300]} diagonally upward: upward attack\r\n　・ {[0105|1300]} diagonally downward: downward attack\r\n\r\nShifting your attacks can be useful when you\r\nand your opponents are at different heights.
nam_technique_title_smash_hold	Charging Smash Attacks
nam_technique_explain_smash_hold	If you hold the attack button during a\r\nsmash attack, you can charge up its\r\npower. It'll reach max charge after\r\none second, and you can hold on to\r\nthe charge for a couple more seconds.
nam_technique_title_sjump	Short Hop
nam_technique_explain_sjump	Press the jump button briefly to jump a\r\nlittle.\r\n\r\nPress the jump and attack button at the\r\nsame time to perform a short-hop attack.\r\n\r\nThere are many ways to use low-altitude\r\nattacks against your opponents!
nam_technique_title_break_fall	Breaking Your Fall
nam_technique_explain_break_fall	You can stop yourself from bouncing if\r\nyou press the shield button just before\r\nyou hit a wall or the ground after\r\nbeing launched.\r\n\r\nThis will help you avoid being KO'd\r\nfrom a bounce, and get you back on\r\nyour feet quickly!
nam_technique_title_hit_move	Launch Shuffling
nam_technique_explain_hit_move	You can affect the direction you're\r\nlaunched in by tilting {[0105|1300]} as you're\r\nlaunched.\r\n\r\nIf you get launched, try to fly in the\r\ndirection with the highest chance\r\nof survival.
nam_technique_title_hit_stop_move	Hitstun Shuffling
nam_technique_explain_hit_stop_move	If you tap {[0105|1300]} in a direction right as\r\nyou're hit with an attack, you can\r\nmove your body in that direction.\r\n\r\nYou can use this method to break\r\nfree of an opponent's combos.
nam_technique_title_just_shield	Perfect Shield
nam_technique_explain_just_shield	If you stop shielding at the moment\r\nyour opponent's attack hits your\r\nshield, nullifying the attack isn't\r\nall that happens.\r\n\r\nYour shield won't be depleted at all,\r\nand you will be able to immediately\r\ncounterattack your opponent!
nam_technique_title_shieldshift	Shield Shift
nam_technique_explain_shieldshift	Tilt {[0105|1300]} lightly to adjust the shield while\r\nshielding. Use either of the inputs\r\nbelow to keep from triggering a dodge.\r\n\r\n　・ Shield button + shield button\r\n　・ Shield button + special-move button\r\n\r\nThis is especially useful when your\r\nshield is smaller.
nam_technique_title_shieldcancel_smashattack	Shield-Cancel Up Smash
nam_technique_explain_shieldcancel_smashattack	Flick {[0105|1300]} up and press the attack button\r\nwhile shielding to unleash an up smash\r\ninstantly.\r\n\r\nShield until you're ready to unleash a\r\nsudden attack on your opponent!
nam_technique_title_air_escape_move	Air Dodge
nam_technique_explain_air_escape_move	Press the shield button while airborne\r\nto quickly dodge attacks.\r\nTilt {[0105|1300]} in a certain direction to dodge\r\nin that direction.\r\n\r\nYou can also use this for a little extra\r\nboost when returning to the stage!
nam_technique_title_item_catch	Catching Items
nam_technique_explain_item_catch	Press the attack button right before\r\nan item hits you to grab it out of the\r\nair. You can pull this off while\r\nstanding on the ground, or\r\nwhile in the air yourself!
nam_technique_title_step_jump	Footstool Jump
nam_technique_explain_step_jump	Jump on an opponent's head to\r\nuse them as a launch pad for\r\nanother jump!\r\n\r\nYou can also do this to make\r\nan opponent's recovery more\r\ndifficult.
nam_technique_title_beanbag	Juggling
nam_technique_explain_beanbag	Keep opponents in the air with\r\ncontinuous attacks to quickly\r\nrack up damage. Up tilt attacks\r\nwork well for this.\r\n\r\nIt tends to work the best when\r\nyour opponent hasn't accumulated\r\nmuch damage.
nam_technique_title_dive	Fast Falling
nam_technique_explain_dive	Flick {[0105|1300]} down while airborne to\r\nget back to the ground quickly.\r\n\r\nFalling faster might throw off\r\nan opponent's timing, but be\r\ncareful not to self-destruct!
nam_technique_title_dash_hold	Dash Grabbing
nam_technique_explain_dash_hold	Perform a grab while running to grab\r\nopponents within a wider range.\r\n\r\nBut if you miss the grab, you'll be\r\nleft wide open!
nam_technique_title_cliff_meteor	Edge Meteor
nam_technique_explain_cliff_meteor	If you send an opponent flying into the\r\nside of the stage below the edge of\r\nBattlefield or Final Destination,\r\nthey'll be bounced downward!\r\n\r\nIt's a risky play, but satisfying when\r\nyou pull it off!
nam_technique_title_catch_cliff_taking	Stealing the Edge
nam_technique_explain_catch_cliff_taking	If you get close enough to grab an\r\nedge that an opponent is already\r\nhanging from, the opponent will\r\nget pushed off.\r\n\r\nThis leaves them vulnerable to your\r\nattacks!
nam_technique_title_catch_cliff_careful	Repeated Edge-Grabbing
nam_technique_explain_catch_cliff_careful	Repeatedly grabbing the edge of the\r\nstage without landing can be risky.\r\n\r\nEach time you grab an edge without\r\nlanding, you become more vulnerable,\r\nand the length of time you are\r\ninvincible when climbing up from\r\nan edge shortens.\r\n\r\nIf you grab it too many times, you\r\nwon't be able to grab it at all!
nam_technique_title_score_snatch	Value of the Last Hit
nam_technique_explain_score_snatch	Whoever is the last player to hit an\r\nopponent will be awarded the point\r\nfor the KO.\r\n\r\nBe the last person to hit someone\r\nas they fly off the screen, and\r\nyou'll get credit for the KO!
nam_technique_title_keep_charge	Storing Your Charge
nam_technique_explain_keep_charge	Some fighters have special moves that\r\ncan be charged up. A fully charged\r\nspecial move will deal some serious\r\ndamage!\r\n\r\nIf you use your shield while charging,\r\nyou can store the charged attack.\r\n\r\nChargeable Special Moves\r\n　・ Donkey Kong: Giant Punch\r\n　・ Samus: Charge Shot\r\n　・ PAC-MAN: Bonus Fruit\r\n　・ R.O.B.: Gyro\r\n　・ Lucario: Aura Sphere\r\n\r\nAnd more!
nam_technique_title_counter	Counters
nam_technique_explain_counter	Counter when getting attacked by\r\nadopting a particular stance.\r\nThe more powerful the attack\r\nreceived is, the stronger the\r\ncounter will be.\r\n\r\nCounter Moves\r\n　・ Marth: Counter\r\n　・ Little Mac: Slip Counter\r\n　・ Shulk: Vision\r\n　・ Corrin: Counter Surge\r\n\r\nAnd more!
nam_technique_title_reflection	Reflecting
nam_technique_explain_reflection	It's possible to reflect projectiles and\r\nitems. The strength and speed of\r\nreflected things goes up, making\r\nthem more dangerous!\r\n\r\nMoves That Can Reflect\r\n　・ Mario: Cape\r\n　・ Fox: Reflector\r\n　・ Ness: Batter Up!\r\n　・ Zelda: Nayru's Love\r\n　・ Pit: Guardian Orbitars\r\n\r\nAnd more!\r\n\r\nIf you get in a reflecting war with\r\nanother fighter, the power of the\r\nreflected thing can increase and\r\nbreak through your reflecting move.\r\nWatch out!

nam_technique_explain_absorption_recovery	The moves below will absorb\r\nenergy-type projectiles, healing you\r\nproportionally to the power of the\r\nprojectile:\r\n\r\n　・ Ness/Lucas: PSI Magnet\r\n　・ Mii Gunner: Absorbing Vortex

nam_technique_explain_gamewatch_absorb_reflect	Mr. Game & Watch's down special can\r\nabsorb energy-type projectiles. If you\r\nabsorb until the barrel fills, you can\r\nunleash a powerful oil attack!\r\n\r\nThe oil's strength depends on the\r\npower of the absorbed attacks.\r\n\r\nAnything that cannot be absorbed\r\nwill be reflected.

nam_technique_explain_wire_recovery	If you hit the edge of a platform with\r\nsome moves, you can dangle\r\nfrom the edge.\r\n\r\nOnce dangling, press the attack\r\nbutton to hoist yourself up and grab\r\nthe edge. This can also be done by\r\ntilting {[0105|1300]} up.\r\n\r\nFighters with moves that can grab\r\nthe edge include\r\n　・ Samus\r\n　・ Young Link\r\n　・ Toon Link\r\n　・ Zero Suit Samus\r\n　・ Simon\r\n\r\nAnd more!

When it reaches\r\nzero, you will not be able to use these items\r\nuntil they recharge.\r\n\r\nYou can see how much durability is left\r\nby looking at the bottom of the screen.

While rolling, you can\r\ncontrol your movement with {[0105|1300]} or the\r\njump button.

nam_technique_explain_strong_weak	The strength of the attack depends on\r\nhow long you hold the button.\r\n\r\n  ・ Short hold: activates quickly\r\n  ・ Long hold: powerful and has a long reach\r\n\r\nHolding an attack will affect how the\r\nmove behaves. For special moves, the\r\nspeed and power will change. Neutral\r\nattack and side tilt attack will change\r\nif opponents are near.

nam_technique_title_cancel_special	Attack Canceling
nam_technique_explain_cancel_special	After hitting an opponent with a basic\r\nattack, you can immediately use a\r\nspecial move to cancel the end of\r\nthe attack animation, allowing you\r\nto do damage more quickly and\r\navoid being vulnerable.\r\n\r\nYou can do this with various attacks,\r\nexcept for up or side smash attacks.
nam_technique_title_saving_attack	Focus Attack
nam_technique_explain_saving_attack	While your down special is charging,\r\nyou can take an attack without flinching.\r\n\r\nCharge it enough and strike an\r\nopponent, and they'll faint. You can\r\nunleash this move midcharge to\r\ncounterattack against an opponent.\r\n\r\nIf your opponent hits you while you're\r\ncharging, quickly flick {[0105|1300]} to the side twice\r\nto cancel this down special and get in\r\nsome damage with other attacks!
nam_technique_title_limit_break	Limit Break
nam_technique_explain_limit_break	You can charge your Limit Gauge with\r\nyour down special.\r\n\r\nWhen the Limit Gauge is at max,\r\nyou can use a powered-up special\r\nonce.\r\n\r\nIf you get attacked while charging, the\r\ngauge will go down. Also, the fully\r\ncharged state will expire after a\r\ncertain period of time.

nam_technique_explain_bayonetta_special_ope	Bayonetta's side special changes\r\ndepending on certain conditions.\r\n\r\n　 ・ When on the ground: side slide\r\n　 ・ When in midair: diagonal-up kick\r\n　 ・ Tilt {[0105|1300]} down in midair: diagonal-down kick\r\n\r\n・ When performed on the ground, you\r\n    can keep holding the button to flip up\r\n    at the end of the move.\r\n\r\n・ Hold the button after attacking to use\r\n    Bullet Arts. Pursue your opponents with\r\n    long-range projectiles.\r\n\r\n・ Jump in midair after an up special to use\r\n    the up special again.

nam_technique_title_stomach_attack	Belly Power
nam_technique_explain_stomach_attack	King K. Rool's belly is extremely tough.\r\n\r\nBeing hit in the belly will not cause\r\nKing K. Rool to flinch, allowing him\r\nto counterattack immediately. It also\r\nreduces the damage you take.\r\n\r\nHowever, taking too much belly\r\ndamage will break your belly and\r\nleave you stunned.\r\n\r\nKing K. Rool can be hit in the belly\r\nduring these attacks:\r\n　・ Side tilt\r\n　・ Dash attack\r\n　・ Up smash\r\n　・ Down smash\r\n　・ Neutral air attack\r\n　・ Down special
nam_technique_title_pirate_cannon	Blunderbuss
nam_technique_explain_pirate_cannon	Fire a cannonball with your\r\nneutral special.\r\n\r\nOnce you shoot, keep holding the\r\nspecial-move button to suck in not\r\nonly the cannonball but opponents, too!\r\nYou can shoot things back out as well!\r\n\r\nDepending on the direction you tilt {[0105|1300]},\r\nyou can change which direction you\r\nfire things out. This move can be\r\nespecially brutal if you manage to\r\nhit an opponent with another\r\nopponent.
nam_technique_title_whip_hold	Whip Hold
nam_technique_explain_whip_hold	You can dangle the whip by holding\r\ndown the button for some attacks.\r\nAfter doing so, use {[0105|1300]} to twirl the\r\nwhip.\r\n\r\nIt's perfect for disrupting an opponent's\r\nattempt to return to the stage or for\r\ndisabling projectiles.
nam_technique_title_revenge	Revenge
nam_technique_explain_revenge	Get ready with down special.\r\n\r\nIf you get hit with an attack during this\r\ntime, your attack power will increase\r\nrelative to the power of the attack that\r\nhit you, making your next attack stronger.\r\n\r\nTake that rage and deal it back out\r\nin a strong attack!
nam_technique_title_rope_swing	Alolan Whip
nam_technique_explain_rope_swing	When the opponent you threw bounces\r\nback toward you, deliver an attack by\r\npressing the special-move button at\r\na certain time.\r\n\r\n　・ Early: perform a back body drop to launch them\r\n　・ Perfect timing: perform a Lariat with full force!\r\n　・ Late: bump into the opponent clumsily
nam_technique_title_spiked_ball	Ptooie
nam_technique_explain_spiked_ball	Blow a spiked ball upward. Press and hold the\r\nspecial-move button to make the spiked ball\r\nfloat up and down.\r\n\r\nTilt {[0105|1300]} to the left or right to toss the spiked ball\r\nin that direction. The spiked ball will fly farther and\r\nfaster when it's closer to Piranha Plant's mouth.
nam_technique_title_long_range	Long-Stem Strike
nam_technique_explain_long_range	Piranha Plant retreats into its flowerpot before\r\nlunging out to bite.\r\n\r\nPress and hold the special-move button to charge\r\nthe move. While charging, you can tilt {[0105|1300]} to the left\r\nor right, which changes the direction Piranha Plant\r\nwill lunge. Charge the move longer to increase\r\nthe range of the attack. The attack's power\r\nincreases with distance.
nam_technique_title_gun_gun_special	Gun / Gun Special
nam_technique_explain_gun_gun_special	You can press and hold the special-move button\r\nto shoot continuously, but the time between each shot\r\nwill be shortened if you press the button repeatedly.\r\n\r\nYou can shoot the gun in different ways by tilting {[0105|1300]}\r\nin different directions or jumping.\r\n\r\n・Ground/Airborne:\r\n\tTilt {[0105|1300]} left or right to dodge while shooting\r\n\r\n・Only on the ground:\r\n\tJump into the air and shoot downward\r\n\r\n・Only while airborne:\r\n\tTilt {[0105|1300]} down to shoot downward\r\n\tTilt {[0105|1300]} up for rapid fire\r\n
nam_technique_title_rebellion_gauge	Rebellion Gauge
nam_technique_explain_rebellion_gauge	The Rebellion Gauge will fill quickly if you're\r\nhit by an opponent's attack while using\r\nthe Rebel's Guard down special. The gauge\r\nwill also fill if Joker or a teammate is hit or KO'd.\r\n\r\nWhen the Rebellion Gauge is full, Joker will\r\nsummon Arsene, who will power up Joker's\r\nattacks and special moves.\r\n\r\nAfter Arsene is summoned, the Rebellion Gauge\r\nwill begin to drain. The gauge will also drain a\r\nbit when Joker takes damage. Once the\r\ngauge is empty, Arsene will depart.
nam_technique_title_brave_keep_charge	Special Moves That Change When Charged
nam_technique_explain_brave_keep_charge	Neutral special: Frizz Type\r\nSide special: Zap Type\r\nUp special: Woosh Type\r\n\r\nThese moves have three levels of power.\r\nEach level of charge requires more MP\r\nthan the level before it.\r\n\r\nYou can store the charge of your\r\nneutral special by shielding or\r\ndodging while charging.
nam_technique_title_command_input	Command Selection
nam_technique_explain_command_input	Use down special to open a command window,\r\nand then select a command.\r\n\r\nCommand Window Controls\r\n　・{[0105|1300]} up/down: move cursor\r\n　・Jump, shield, dodge: cancel\r\n　・Attack button, special-move button: confirm\r\n\r\nYou will be left vulnerable while selecting.
nam_technique_title_wonderwing	Wonderwing
nam_technique_explain_wonderwing	Tackle while invincible with side special.\r\n\r\nYou will need a Golden Feather to use it.\r\nIf you don't have enough, you will fall and\r\nbecome vulnerable.\r\n\r\nGolden Feathers will not be replenished\r\nuntil you are KO'd.\r\n\r\nYou will normally get five Golden Feathers.\r\nYou can use only one during Sudden Death.
nam_technique_title_breegull_blaster	Breegull Blaster
nam_technique_explain_breegull_blaster	Press and hold the special-move button to enter\r\nBreegull Blaster mode. While in this mode, you\r\ncan repeatedly shoot eggs.\r\n\r\nAs you shoot, the power will eventually drop\r\n(up to two times). After canceling Breegull Blaster,\r\nthe power will gradually return to normal. \r\n\r\nYou can cancel Breegull Blaster mode by shielding,\r\ncrouching, or using another special move.
nam_technique_title_dolly_special_command	Differentiating Special Moves and Commands
nam_technique_explain_dolly_special_command	The strength of the attack depends on how long\r\nyou hold the button.\r\n\r\n・Quick press: activates quickly and leaves\r\n\t          you less vulnerable\r\n・Hold down: powerful and has a long reach\r\n\r\nAlso, use a specific input with {[0105|1300]}\r\nto power up the move.\r\n\r\nCommand Input (When Facing Right)\r\n・Burning Knuckle: ↓→ + attack button\r\n・Crack Shoot: ↓← + attack button\r\n・Rising Tackle: hold ↓, then input ↑ + attack button\r\n・Power Dunk:  →↓ + attack button\r\n\r\nThe input will be reversed when facing left.
nam_technique_title_dolly_cancel_special	Attack Canceling
nam_technique_explain_dolly_cancel_special	After hitting an opponent with a normal\r\nattack, you can immediately use a\r\nspecial move to cancel the end of the\r\nattack animation, allowing you to do\r\ndamage more quickly and avoid\r\nbeing vulnerable.\r\n\r\nThe attacks below cannot be quickly\r\nfollowed by a special move:\r\n・Third stage of the neutral attack\r\n・Smash attack\r\n・Forward air attack\r\n・Back air attack\r\n・Dash Attack\r\n・Dodge Attack
nam_technique_title_dolly_super_special	Super Special Move
nam_technique_explain_dolly_super_special	You can use a powerful command-input move\r\nafter having taken significant damage.\r\n\r\n・Stock and Time: accumulated damage is more than 100%\r\n・Stamina: stamina remaining is 1/3 or less\r\n\r\nCommand Input (When Facing Right)\r\n・Power Geyser: \r\n↓←→ + attack button or ↓←↓→ + attack button\r\n・Buster Wolf: \r\n↓→↓→ + attack button or ↓→↓→ + attack button\r\nThe input will be reversed when facing left.\r\n\r\nIf you input the command with everything reversed,\r\nTerry will reverse his attack.
nam_technique_title_dolly_dodge_attack	Dodge Attack
nam_technique_explain_dolly_dodge_attack	You can use an up tilt attack that makes Terry's\r\nupper body briefly invincible by pressing the\r\nattack button when dodging in place.\r\n\r\nDodge a devastating blow from the enemy,\r\nthen quickly counterattack!\r\n\r\nThis is especially useful against foes that\r\nare attacking from above.
nam_technique_title_master_failnaught	Failnaught
nam_technique_explain_master_failnaught	Your neutral special will draw the bow. You can\r\ndodge or shield while drawing the bow, as well as\r\nchange the direction you're aiming by pressing\r\n{[0105|1300]} left or right.\r\n\r\nHold the button down to charge the attack. \r\nYou cannot dodge, shield, or change directions\r\nwhile charging.\r\n\r\nOnce the bow has been drawn and the attack\r\nhas charged for a period of time, a powerful\r\nattack will fire straight out in the direction\r\nyou are facing.
nam_technique_title_master_sword_of_the_creator	Sword of the Creator
nam_technique_explain_master_sword_of_the_creator	Use the up special to extend the sword upward\r\nat an angle. The attack's behavior will change\r\ndepending on what it hits.\r\n\r\n・Opponent: Jump up and onto the opponent.\r\n・Wall: Pull to and jump from the wall.\r\n・Edge: Dangle from the sword.\r\n　　　　 Use the attack button or up on the {[0105|1300]} to\r\n\t shorten the sword and grab the edge.
nam_technique_title_master_aymr	Aymr
nam_technique_explain_master_aymr	Swing the axe in a powerful downward blow with\r\nthe down special.\r\n\r\nAfter starting the move, you can use {[0105|1300]} to turn in\r\nthe opposite direction you're facing.\r\n\r\nIf you're on the ground when you swing the axe,\r\nyou won't flinch if an opponent strikes you.\r\n\r\nYou can also move through some platforms by\r\nholding {[0105|1300]} down while using this move.
nam_technique_title_tantan_punch	ARM Attack
nam_technique_explain_tantan_punch	The attack button punches with the left ARM and\r\nthe special-move button punches with the right.\r\n\r\nYou can still move while attacking, and you can\r\neven throw a punch with the other ARM!\r\n\r\nFlick the stick to the side to use a smash attack.\r\nThis increases the range and power, but you\r\nwon't be able to move, leaving you vulnerable.\r\n\r\nWhen on the ground, tilt the stick up or down\r\nright before throwing a punch to aim it up or down.
nam_technique_title_tantan_arm_change	Three ARMS in One
nam_technique_explain_tantan_arm_change	Use the down special to switch between three ARMS.\r\n\r\n・Ramram: Medium range, light power. Can curve swiftly.\r\nUseful for keeping opponents on the defensive.\r\n・Megawatt: Short range, extremely powerful, but poor\r\nturning potential. Perfect for finishing off a foe.\t       \r\n・Dragon: Long range, average speed and maneuverability.\r\nHold down the button during a smash attack to fire a laser.
nam_technique_title_tantan_dragon	Transforming into a Dragon
nam_technique_explain_tantan_dragon	When throwing opponents, the left ARM will power up,\r\ntransforming into a dragon.\r\n\r\nThis transformation will end after some time passes, if\r\nMin Min is grabbed, or if Min Min is knocked down.\r\n\r\nWhen Min Min's Final Smash is charged, the left ARM\r\nwill turn into a dragon.
nam_technique_title_tantan_arm_jump	ARMS Jump / ARM Hook
nam_technique_explain_tantan_arm_jump	The up special changes depending on if it's used on the\r\nground or in the air.\r\n\r\n・Ground: Use the ARMS to jump up into the air.\r\nHold the button to jump higher.\r\n・In the air: Attack diagonally upward by extending the\r\nARMS. Hit an edge to dangle from it, then retract the ARMS\r\nby pressing the same button or tilting up with the {[0105|1300]}.
nam_technique_title_pickel_mine	Materials and Mining
nam_technique_explain_pickel_mine	Mine the floor right below you to get\r\nsome materials. Depending on the ground,\r\nthe materials you can get easily will vary.\r\n\r\nIn order of weak to strong: dirt, wood, stone, iron.\r\nGold, redstone, and diamond can also be mined.
nam_technique_title_pickel_material_gauge	Material Gauge
nam_technique_explain_pickel_material_gauge	The materials you've collected are visible on the\r\nlower part of the screen.\r\n\r\n・The gauge shows the ratio of dirt, wood, stone,\r\nand iron. You can see the exact quantity of iron\r\nwhen the amount collected is small.\r\n・Gold and diamond are shown next to the gauge.\r\nIt will flash when you have enough to craft with it.\r\n・Redstone is not shown.
nam_technique_title_pickel_craft	Craft
nam_technique_explain_pickel_craft	Stand in front of the crafting table and use\r\nyour neutral special to create or repair tools.\r\n\r\nTools will be created from the strongest\r\nmaterials first.\r\n\r\nDash, jump, shield, or press the attack\r\nbutton to cancel the move.
nam_technique_title_pickel_create_block	Create Block
nam_technique_explain_pickel_create_block	Use neutral special in the air to place\r\nblocks at your feet. This move uses the\r\nweakest materials first.\r\n\r\nHold down the button and move to continuously\r\nplace blocks.\r\n\r\nThe blocks will break after a certain amount\r\nof time if left alone, or faster if they are stepped on.
nam_technique_title_pickel_minecart	Minecart
nam_technique_explain_pickel_minecart	Use your side special to ride the minecart.\r\nRiding in the minecart uses iron.\r\n\r\nIf you're riding in the minecart, you'll damage\r\nany opponents you hit. If the minecart is empty\r\nand hits an opponent, it will carry them away.\r\n\r\nIf you have gold and redstone, use the button to\r\nplace powered rails.
nam_technique_title_pickel_elytra	Elytra
nam_technique_explain_pickel_elytra	Move {[0105|1300]} up or down to change the direction of\r\nthe up special.\r\n\r\nYou can fly higher by taking advantage of the speed\r\nincrease at the start of the move or using the speed\r\nyou build up when falling.
nam_technique_title_edge_air_f	Wall Stab
nam_technique_explain_edge_air_f	When there is a wall in front of you, you can use a\r\nforward air attack to stab into it with the blade.\r\n\r\nAfter stabbing, you can hang around for a bit.\r\nYou can even jump from that position!\r\n\r\nBe aware that you can only stab the wall so many\r\ntimes without touching the ground.
nam_technique_title_edge_shadow_flare	Shadow Flare 
nam_technique_explain_edge_shadow_flare	Unleash a small, quick blast of energy with the\r\nside special.\r\n\r\nIf the energy hits an opponent, it will surround\r\nand orbit them for a time before exploding.\r\n\r\nYou can increase the number of shots (up to five)\r\norbiting an opponent with a combination of charged\r\nshots and hitting the opponent multiple times.
nam_technique_title_edge_scintilla	Scintilla
nam_technique_explain_edge_scintilla	The down special will deploy a barrier of light\r\nthat, after a bit, becomes Scintilla.\r\n\r\nOr, if the barrier is struck, it will quickly change into\r\nScintilla. It'll be stronger the more damage it takes.\r\n\r\nThis move is similar to a counter, but it will become\r\nScintilla after a while whether or not it is struck by\r\nan attack.
nam_technique_title_edge_one_winged	Winged Form
nam_technique_explain_edge_one_winged	If the match isn't going your way, your one\r\nwing will emerge and enhance your abilities,\r\nincreasing attack power and movement speed,\r\nas well as giving you two airborne jumps and\r\nsuper armor at the start of smash attacks.\r\n\r\nWinged Form not only accounts for accumulated\r\ndamage but will also come into play based on\r\nyour score or a difference in stock remaining too!
nam_technique_title_element_swap	Pyra and Mythra
nam_technique_explain_element_swap	The down special swaps between Pyra and Mythra.\r\n\r\n・Pyra: high power and low speed\r\n・Mythra: low power and high speed
nam_technique_title_element_traits	Flare Smash / Foresight
nam_technique_explain_element_traits	Pyra and Mythra each have their own unique traits.\r\n\r\n・Pyra\r\nThe side smash attack deals a lot of damage and\r\nhas high launch power.\r\n\r\n・Mythra\r\nIf an opponent lands an attack right before you dodge,\r\nyou will take less damage and trigger a slow effect.
nam_technique_title_element_neutral_special	Flame Nova / Lightning Buster
nam_technique_explain_element_neutral_special	You can hold down the button to charge up the\r\ncharacters' neutral special in the following ways:\r\n\r\n・Pyra: increased power and number of rotations\r\n・Mythra: increased power and attack range\r\nFully charge the attack to increase the number of blows.\r\n\r\nThe charge of these attacks cannot be stored.
nam_technique_title_element_flame_blazing_end	Blazing End
nam_technique_explain_element_flame_blazing_end	The side special will throw the sword forward and\r\nthen rotate the sword at the new location.\r\n\r\nFlick the stick to increase the distance the sword travels.\r\n\r\nYou cannot attack until the sword returns. You can still\r\ndash, jump, or shield.
nam_technique_title_element_light_up_special	Ray of Punishment / Chroma Dust
nam_technique_explain_element_light_up_special	The up special will change depending on\r\nwhat you do before reaching the jump's peak.\r\n\r\n・Release the button quickly to shoot\r\none large shot that bursts on impact.\r\n\r\n・Keep holding the button or press it again to\r\nfire a scattering shot that hits a wide range.
nam_technique_title_demon_rage	Rage
nam_technique_explain_demon_rage	Become engulfed in a red aura when you are in a pinch.\r\nThe power of your attacks will increase, and you\r\ncan use Rage Drive.\r\n\r\n・Stock or time battle: accumulated damage is 100% or more\r\n・Stamina battle: remaining stamina is 1/4 or less\r\n\r\nRage will end once Rage Drive hits. Rage will also end if\r\nyou miss with Rage Drive or take damage too many times.
nam_technique_title_demon_rage_drive	Rage Drive
nam_technique_explain_demon_rage_drive	You can use a powerful Rage Drive while in a Rage on the ground.\r\n\r\nHow to use Rage Drive\r\n・→↓ + hold down attack button or special-move button (when\r\nfacing right)\r\n・Down special\r\n・Grab\r\n\r\nIf you use →↓ + hold down the button, the power will increase.\r\nThe inputs will be reversed when facing left.\r\n\r\nIf Rage Drive hits, the Rage will come to an end.
nam_technique_title_demon_normal_attack	10 Hit Combo and Flash Punch Combo
nam_technique_explain_demon_normal_attack	The neutral attack will change into two moves depending\r\non how you press the attack button.\r\n\r\n・Quickly push or hold down: 10 Hit Combo\r\n・Enter the 3rd neutral attack a bit slower: Flash Punch Combo
nam_technique_title_demon_command	Moves That Can Be Used with Special Inputs
nam_technique_explain_demon_command	If you combine {[0105|1300]} and button inputs, you can use\r\ndifferent moves.\r\n\r\nMoves that can be performed with command-inputs\r\n(when Kazuya is facing right)\r\n・Left Splits Kick: →→ + attack button\r\n・Roundhouse to Triple Spin Kicks:   + attack button\r\nfour times\r\n・Gates of Hell: ↓ + grab\r\n・Demon God Fist: attack button while standing up from\r\na crouch\r\n・Tombstone Crusher: while crouching  + attack button etc.\r\n\r\nThe inputs are reversed when facing left.
nam_technique_title_demon_crouch_dash	Moves That Trigger from Crouch Dash
nam_technique_explain_demon_crouch_dash	During directional inputs →↓, you can perform a\r\nspecial dash while invincible.\r\n\r\nInput additional buttons to use different moves, too.\r\n\r\n・Wind God Fist: →↓ + attack button \r\n　Or press  and the attack button at the same time to\r\nperform an Electric Wind God Fist　\r\n・Dragon Uppercut: →↓ + hold down attack button\r\n・Spinning Demon to Left Hook: →↓ + special-move button\r\n\r\nThe inputs will be reversed when facing left.
nam_technique_title_trail_combo	Combo Attacks
nam_technique_explain_trail_combo	Some moves can strike up to three times if the button is\r\nrepeatedly pressed or is held down.\r\n\r\nMoves that can strike repeatedly\r\n　・Neutral Attack\r\n　・Side Tilt Attack\r\n　・Neutral Air Attack\r\n　・Forward Air Attack
nam_technique_title_trail_magic	Firaga/Thundaga/Blizzaga
nam_technique_explain_trail_magic	The neutral special will change each time it is used,\r\nin the following order:\r\nFiraga → Thundaga → Blizzaga\r\n\r\n・Firaga: Shoot fire shots.\r\n                   Repeatedly press the button to continuously shoot.\r\n・Thundaga: Call down lightning that affects a wide area in front.\r\n                   Useful against airborne opponents.\r\n・Blizzaga: Shoot scattering ice shots.\r\n                   Continuously hit opponents to freeze them for a long time.
nam_technique_title_trail_sonic_blade	Sonic Blade
nam_technique_explain_trail_sonic_blade	Charge forward while wielding the Keyblade using the side special.\r\nCharge up to two additional times by tilting the control stick or\r\nholding the button while charging.\r\n\r\n・Tilt {[0105|1300]}: Charge in the tilted direction\r\n・Special-move button: Charge forward or toward opponent
